title: vfs: Modification time updates are not being updated in the remote
body:
<!--

Welcome :-) We understand you are having a problem with rclone; we want to help you with that!

If you've just got a question or aren't sure if you've found a bug then please use the rclone forum:

    https://forum.rclone.org/

instead of filing an issue for a quick response.

If you think you might have found a bug, please can you try to replicate it with the latest beta?

    https://beta.rclone.org/
    
If you can still replicate it with the latest beta, then please fill in the info below which makes our lives much easier.  A log with -vv will make our day :-)

Thank you

The Rclone Developers

-->

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?


Modification time changes in the mount are not being updated to the remote.


#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

rclone v1.54.0-beta.4901.43e8c9def.fix-drive-changes
- os/arch: linux/amd64
- go version: go1.15.5

This is from my fork at https://github.com/darthShadow/rclone/commits/fix-drive-changes which only has 1 extra commit and no changes related to this.


#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (e.g. Windows 7, 64 bit)

Ubuntu 18.04.5


####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (e.g. Google Drive)

Google Drive


#### The command you were trying to run (e.g. `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

```
/home/darthshadow/bin/rclone mount PersonalTD:Media "${MOUNT_DIR}" \
    --use-mmap \
    --fast-list \
    --umask=002 \
    --allow-other \
    --attr-timeout=0 \
    --buffer-size=8M \
    --async-read=false \
    --poll-interval=0 \
    --config="${CONFIG}" \
    --cache-dir="${CACHE_DIR}" \
    --dir-cache-time=96000h \
    --drive-chunk-size=256M \
    --drive-pacer-min-sleep=1ms \
    --vfs-read-chunk-size=8M \
    --vfs-read-chunk-size-limit=8M \
    --vfs-cache-mode=full \
    --vfs-write-back=1m30s \
    --vfs-cache-max-age="${TD_CACHE_AGE}" \
    --vfs-cache-max-size="${TD_CACHE_SIZE}" \
    --vfs-cache-poll-interval=5m \
    --log-level=INFO \
    --log-file="${LOG_FILE}" \
    --stats=30s \
    --stats-log-level=NOTICE \
    --rc \
    --rc-no-auth \
    --rc-addr=127.0.0.1:5573 \
    --rc-job-expire-duration=30m \
    --rc-job-expire-interval=60s \
    --tpslimit-burst=100 \
    --drive-disable-http2=true
```


#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (e.g. output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

[update_modtime.log](https://github.com/rclone/rclone/files/5583106/update_modtime.log)
